info.name: OpenIZ Disconnected Client Core
info.author: Mohawk College of Applied Arts and Technology - mHealth & eHealth Development & Innovation Centre

strings.string: No alert selected, please select one to view its contents.
Please log into OpenIZ to continue
Forgot password is available online only
Your password must be at least 8 characters long and contain one Uppercase letter
Enter the name of the user for which you wish to reset the password.
To reset your password we need to verify it is you. Select a verification method:
A secret has been sent to you, enter the secret below. If you do not receive the secret you can press "send" to get a new secret sent to you.
Please enter the first part of your e-mail address (ex: john@domain.com would be "john")
Please enter the last four digits of your phone number
Enter the first part of your e-mail
Enter the last four digits of your phone number
To reset your password, you must be online
Your identity could not be validated
The requested resource was not found:
There was an internal error rendering the page. Please check the mobile log files.
Use this form to submit a bug or feedback on this page.
I cannot perform my assigned tasks because of this bug
This bug is severe and I cannot work around it
I can work around this bug but it interrupts my workflow
I am able to work around this bug
This device name has already been registered. Do you want to replace this device registration on the server? (If you do, another deivce with this name may not be able to connect)
There was an error contacting the realm using the settings you entered. Please ensure you are online, the realm server root is accessable, and you're using the correct settings.

A realm is a security domain to which OpenIZ is joined. This realm is responsible for controlling security settings, data synchronization as well administrative functions such as the concept dictionary.
This setting controls the device name of this tablet
This setting controls the realm ID
This setting controls the port number
This panel allows you to configure manner in which data is stored and synchronized with the central environment.
This setting controls the data mode for this tablet
OpenIZ Disconnected Client keeps application log files which can be sent to a centralized diagnosis server in the case of application crash. Use this panel to configure the verbosity of those logs
This setting controls the level of log detail for this tablet
Log Everything (results in large log files)
Use this panel to configure the manner in which security policies are enforced on this device.
This setting controls the strength of password encryption for this tablet
Allow local authorization, this will allow clients to log into the app even if the internet is down
This setting controls the synchronize events for this tablet
This setting controls the polling interval for this tablet
Your application is not joined to any realm!
This operation will remove all local unsynchronized data. Are you sure you want to leave the realm
Your application is now joined to this realm

You are about to restore the database back to the last backed-up state. This operation will erase the current application database and will replace it with the last backup. Only continue if you are sure you wish to perform this action.

You are about to purge all data in this installation. This will force the application to download a fresh set of clinic data (as though you've never opened the application before). You will also lose any changes which have not been synchronized to the server. Only continue if you're sure you want to perform this action.
Create a backup of my current data
This panel allows you to configure the behavior of the OpenIZ synchronization process.
Select this option to proxy all requests sent from the mobile device through an HTTP proxy.
This setting controls the subscribed facility for this tablet
Do not retain audits (erase when app starts)
This setting controls how long the applet will keep an audit trail locally
Only allow people in the subscribed facilities to login
Password Reset Can Only Be Done When Online
This e-mail address appears to be invalid
This mobile appears to be invalid
There was an error changing your password
There was an error changing your password recovery details
Please enter your new password confirmation
The database file this relies on is locked. There may be a background process using the database file. Please wait a few minutes and try your request again.
Your issue has been successfully submitted to the central ticketing system
For your reference, your ticket ID# is:
Enter the steps that you performed prior to encountering the bug/issue
Attach application information (versions, log files, settings, etc.)
Are you sure you wish to upgrade this applet? Your application will restart after the update is applied
Good news! There's a new version of the application available. Tap here to go to the update page.
There are other places this value is used. Would you like to also update those values?

Welcome to OpenIZ Disconnected Client Core!

You might be wondering where the Immunization Screens are, well that's easy, all you have to do is install an application with a startup asset and point this application at it! To get started implementing your own OpenIZ applets you can use the nifty template here
A general error occurred. Please check the logs.
Your session is about to expire in
Tap this message to extend your session.

You are about to perform an action that will attempt to force the IMS server to accept data. This may overwrite previous changes made by other users. It is not recommended you do such an action unless you're sure the data is correct. Do you want to continue?
You are about to perform an action that will force the IMS server to accept this change. This may undo other user's changes. Are you sure you wish to continue?
Are you sure you want to ignore sending this data to the server? If the data was an insert it will only exist on your local tablet and not on the server.
The item you are deleting was an insert, if you continue whatever data contained in the insert will not be on the server. Are you sure you want to continue?
The reason this object was rejected
Data that was attempted to be submitted
Le ressource demandee n'a pas pu etra trouve.
Il y avait une erreru rendu cette page. S'il vous plait verifier les fishiers journaux.
Vous ne possedez pas de privileges suffisants pour voir la page.
Jina la mtumiaji au neno siri ni batili
Makosa majenerali ilitokea. Tafadhali angalia rekodi.
Ingiza jina la mtumiaji unayetaka kubadili neno siri
Una uhakika unataka kuboresha kijiprogramu hii? Maombi yako upya baada ya usasishaji inatumika
Habari njema! Kuna toleo jipya la programu inapatikana. Gonga hapa ili kwenda kwenye ukurasa sasisha.
Hakuna tahadhari kuchaguliwa, tafadhali chagua moja ili kuona maudhui yake.
Kuna maeneo mengine ambapo thamani hii ni kutumika. Je, ungependa pia update maadili hizo?
Tatizo lako limewasilishwa kwa mfumo mkuu wa tiketi
Kwa ajili ya kumbukumbu yako, tiketi yako ID# ni
Nukulu hatua zilizochukuliwa kabla ya suala mkutano
Ambatanisha maelezo ya maombi (matoleo, kuingia faili, mipangilio, nk)
Kulikuwa na hitilafu ya ndani utoaji ukurasa. Tafadhali angalia files mkononi kumbukumbu.
Tumia fomu hii kuwasilisha mdudu au maoni kwenye ukurasa huu.
Siwezi kufanya kazi yangu kwa sababu ya kupewa mdudu hii
Mdudu hii ni muhimu siwezi kufanya kazi na hii
Siwezi kufanya kazi karibu mdudu hii lakini hutatiza kazi yangu
Mimi ni uwezo wa kufanya kazi karibu mdudu hii
Ingiza jina la mtumiaji kwa ajili ya ambayo unataka kuweka upya ya nenosiri.
Ili kuweka upya nenosiri lako, tunahitaji kuthibitisha ni wewe. Kuchagua njia ya kuthibitisha:
Nenosiri alitumwa, ingiza msimbo hapo chini. Kama hakuwa na kupokea siri unaweza bonyeza "Tuma" kupokea nambari ya siri mpya.
Tafadhali weka sehemu ya kwanza ya barua pepe yako (kwa mfano: john@domain.com itakuwa "john")
Tafadhali ingiza tarakimu nne za mwisho za nambari yako ya
Weka sehemu ya kwanza ya barua pepe yako
Ingiza tarakimu nne za mwisho za nambari yako ya
Weka neno siri yako mpya chini
Ili kuweka upya neno siri lako, lazima uwe mtandaoni
Nambari yako ya siri ni batili

Karibu OpenIZ Core Mteja Disconnected!

Kuwa na uwezo wa kutumia kurasa kinga, kufunga maombi sambamba na mabadiliko kuanza mali kwa uhakika wa programu hii! Ili kuanza kutekeleza OpenIZ yako applets mwenyewe unaweza kutumia template nifty hapa
Neno siri upya inaweza tu kufanyika wakati mtandao ni juu ya
Anwani hii ya barua pepe inaonekana si sahihi
Idadi hii ya mkononi inaonekana si sahihi
Kulikuwa na hitilafu kubadilisha password maelezo yako ya uokoaji
Tafadhali weka neno siri lako la sasa
Tafadhali ingia katika kuendelea kwa OpenIZ
Ili kuweka upya neno siri lako, lazima uwe mtandaoni
Nywila yako lazima angalau herufi 8 na vyenye moja herufi kubwa mbili
Kipindi chako kinakaribia kwisha muda katika
Gonga ujumbe huu kwa kupanua kikao.
Fuata hatua zile zile kabla ya kupata hii hitilafu.
Jina la mtumiaji na neno siri ni batili
Tafadhali ingiza jina la mtumiaji na neno siri, uweze kuendelea
Kwa kumbukumbu, namba ya tiketi yako ni:
Tumia fomu hii kutuma hitilafu au mrejesho kuhusu ukurasa huu
Akaunti inahitaji uthibitisho wa aina mbili
Kuweka hii udhibiti kupigia kura muda kwa kompyuta hii
Realm ni sehemu ya usalama ambayo OpenIZ imejiunga. Kazi ya realm ni kuratibu maelekezo ya usalama, usawazishaji wa taarifa na kazi za utawala wa mfumo kama vile kamusi kompyuta
Ninaweza kuendelea licha ya hii hitilafu
Tunza kila kitu(inasababisha faili kumbukumbu kuwa kubwa)
Tahadhari haijachaguliwa, chaugua moja wapo kuona maelezo yake.
Kuweka hii udhibiti matukio synchronize kwa kompyuta hii
Kuna sehemu nyingine zinazohusu hili chaguo. Je, ungependa kusasisha hizi sehemu pia?
wala kurejesha ukaguzi (kufuta wakati programu kuanza)
udhibiti huu kuweka muda gani kijiprogramu kushika uchaguzi ukaguzi wa ndani
Kuweka hii udhibiti mode data kwa kompyuta hii
Kuweka hii udhibiti kituo waliojisajili kwa kompyuta hii
Kuweka hii udhibiti ngazi ya kumbukumbu undani kwa kompyuta hii
Kuweka hii udhibiti nguvu ya encryption password kwa kompyuta hii
Kuweka hii linadhibiti kifaa jina la kompyuta hii
Kuweka hii udhibiti nambari ya lango
Ruhusu watu katika vituo umejisajili kuingia
migogoro kati ya seva na kompyuta

Unakaribia kutekeleza kitendo itajaribu nguvu IMS server kukubali data. Hii inaweza overwrite mabadiliko ya awali yaliyotolewa na watumiaji wengine. Inapendekezwa si kufanya hatua hiyo isipokuwa kama una uhakika data ni sahihi. Je, unataka kuendelea?
Unakaribia kutekeleza hatua ambayo nguvu IMS server kukubali mabadiliko hayo. Hii inaweza kuondoa mabadiliko mengine ya mtumiaji. Una uhakika unataka kuendelea?
Una uhakika unataka kupuuza kutuma data hii kwa server? Kama data ni kuingiza itakuwa kuwepo tu kwenye kompyuta yako ya ndani na si kwenye seva.
wewe ni kufuta kumbukumbu kuingizwa, rekodi zitatolewa kutoka server kama utaendelea. Una uhakika unataka kuendelea?
The computer system file this relies on is locked. There may be a hidden process using the computer system file. Please wait a few minutes and try your request again.
